Latest changes before release of the Pump.io support

http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/34
Typos in description fixed

Pump.io message sending: without reply is a 'note', with reply -
'comment'

This is not documented at
https://github.com/e14n/pump.io/blob/master/API.md but it looks like a
convention.

Removed permission RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED and corresponding code.

As Android system manages synchronization of AndStatus accounts, there
is no need in any actions on boot.
